About me

Get to know a bit about what I've done and what I do

I love designing and creating digital experiences that solve real user problems and help companies achieve their goals. I consider myself a positive, proactive, methodical, self-taught person, and I put my all into every project I undertake.

When I'm not working, I enjoy exercising, reading, traveling, spending time with family and friends, cooking, and learning new skills.

After Effects Domestika

2023

Workflow, timeline, and masks. 3D: layers, cameras, light, and depth. Motion graphics: shape layers and text animation. Postproduction: effects and animation. Introduction to Advanced After Effects

Certificate

HTML5 and CSS3 at Udemy

2023

Flexbox & Grid layout, responsive design, animations & transitions, advanced selectors, CSS preposessors, CSS custom properties, transformations & transitions, filters & shadows, CSS grid systems and perfomance optimization

Certificate

Design 21st century at IDF

2022

How to solve global problems, how can we democratize design, how can we apply human-centered design and how can we move up in a company

Certificate

Information vis at IDF

2022

Information visualization principles, effective techniques, and the interplay between the eye and the brain

Certificate

Emotional design at IDF

2022

Emotion and design, how human factors affect, positive emotional experiences, what the “Triune brain” is and visceral & reflective design

Certificate

Visual design at IDF

2022

This course explores good design principles, emphasizing effective use of visual elements, color theory application, and the significance of typography and grid systems in improving design outcomes

Certificate

Mobile UX Design at IDF

2022

Mobile interfaces, mobile user experience, UI (android and IOS), how to avoid bad design and UX design strategy

Certificate

UI Design Patterns at IDF

2022

The efficiency of UI design patterns, emphasizing their selection, content organization for usability, and strategies for minimizing user effort

Certificate

HCI at IDF

2021

Intuitive user experience, loyalty & business profitability and navigation & screen design

Certificate

User research at IDF

2021

Qualitative user research, design process, validation & ethical sound, usability test & observation, how to deal with results and how to deal with clients, bosses & stakeholders

Certificate

Gestalt psychology at IDF

2021

Gestalt principles, origins of gestalt, gestalt laws, gestalt driven approach and perceptual organization

Certificate

UX Foundations at Google

2021

Consumers and business, UX design concepts, experience design, design sprints, UX research methods and biases in UX design

Certificate

Marketing degree at URJC

2016

Data analysis and synthesis, organizational skills, communication, economic and business, interdisciplinary skills and critical capacity

Certificate

Product designer at Geomites

March 2023 - Present

Presently, I am engaged as a freelance product designer contributing to the development of an independent mobile game. I collaborate closely with a team of five individuals, adhering to an agile methodology. My responsibilities encompass defining the design roadmap, aligning it with our technological stack, and addressing specific constraints.
Primarily utilizing Figma and Adobe Illustrator, I am tasked with crafting the design system, prototypes, and wireframes to maintain consistency across diverse user flows. Additionally, I conduct comprehensive market research, heuristic analyses, and content evaluations to inform optimal decision-making.

Product designer at Atipiko Tours

December 2022 - March 2023

In collaboration with a web developer, I operated as part of a freelance team to construct a website for a travel agency from inception. My involvement extended to project ideation, competitive analysis, conducting user interviews, designing user flows, establishing a design system, and iterative collaboration with the developer to ensure the overall quality of the final product.

Product designer & Web developer Senzo Studio

September 2022 - December 2022

As an independent freelancer, I undertook the comprehensive design and development of a website for a Visual Effects (VFX) company. Managing the entire project from the initial definition of client requirements, through web design, hosting administration, and continuous feedback collection from both clients and potential prospects.

Product designer at Tattoo Paradise

March 2023 - Present

Tattoo Paradise represents a personal, non-compensated endeavor involving the development of a mobile application from inception. This application facilitates users within the realm of tattoos to explore designs and discover independent studios and artists. The primary objective of this project was to apply, in a tangible and comprehensive manner, the skills acquired through various experiences.

Entrepreneur at Dako

July 2020 - July 2021

I co-founded a delivery company with a colleague, focusing on the distribution of fresh pasta within the Madrid Metropolitan area. In my capacity as a founder, I assumed diverse responsibilities, overseeing and executing tasks essential to the development and success of the project.

Purchasing manager at Promam

2017 - 2020

At Proman, a small-scale industrial machinery manufacturing company, I served as the Purchasing Manager, acting as a crucial liaison between the management, workforce, clients, and suppliers. In this role, I facilitated effective communication and coordination across all stakeholders involved in the procurement process.

Chef at StreetXo

2016 - 2017

I devoted over a year to residing and working in London, where I was employed at a prestigious restaurant under the guidance of a globally renowned chef. My responsibilities encompassed both culinary tasks and providing impeccable service to discerning clientele.

Hospitality Industry

2009 - 2016

I have garnered diverse experience in the hospitality industry, having served in roles as a waiter, chef, and ham cutter across various catering companies, hotels, and restaurants. Highlighting 7 years of service to Real Madrid through Catering Mallorca in the VIP Area of the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium.
